channel.title: Xenoscape Dev Team (Up again)
channel.description:
[b]ALL MEMBERS OF TEAM PLEASE EMAIL ME AT codex-marius@hotmail.com AND ASK ME FOR ACTIVATION KEY FOR THIS SITE: SOMEONE ALREADY GOT!
[url=http://xenoscape.ulmb.com/mgmt]xenoscape.ulmb.com/mgmt[/url][/b]
[b][size=20pt]Xeno Dev Team[/size][/b]
[font=Courier]._______________________________________________________ |-------Project---------Status----------Deadline--------| |------XenoScape--------14%-------------31.08.07--------| |_______________________________________________________|[/font]
Sorry about the other theard. I got new computer, so now I'm starting the coding team all over again. Well, I dont know if I can host yet, but I post spaces. (sry, cleared list)
Anyways. Hope you are happy, cause XenoScape is soon up. Me and the team will be active, so I think the server will be fast up. Ive already started a bit, and here is a little list of what I made so far. (I made everything by meself.)
[b][size=15pt][u]Already made[/u][/size] [size=12pt](I made everything (no tutorials followed))[/size][/b]
[ Nothing yet. had to reinstall computer :( ]
[size=15pt][b][u]Goals[/u][/b][/size]
[ul][li]Fix most bugs, and fix most doors and ladders.[/li] [li]Just admin and mod commands (more realistic, and shit easy to do :P)[/li] [li]Fix monster hp, drops, animations and making them face to players.[/li] [li]Making a more realistic source.[/li] [li]Shops, spawns, quests and guides.[/li] [li]Guild doors with timers (closes after 2 secounds)[/li] [li]Mini quests.[/li] [li]Making 100% new magic. (new gfx and buttons (interfaces and other runes) for magic)[/li] [li]Trying to make more java files for each skill for less lagg.[/li] [li]And much more[/li][/ul]
We will also do more. Here is a list of the team.
[center][b]Owner[/b] Xeno (Mariuswb)
[b]Hoster[/b] [ Maybe open slot ]
[b]Graphics for client[/b] (no background needed. I made) [ Open slot ]
[b]Website[/b] Ultimacool2 (forums) Coyle (mgmt)
[b]Coders[/b] (Which will get admin rank) [ Open slot ] [ Open slot ]
[b]Coders[/b] (Which will get mod rank. They who edit autospawn, and make shops) [ Open slot ] [ Open slot ] [ Open slot ]
Also i need someone to make sprites for magic spells.[/center]
If you want to apply, use this form.
[b]Position:[/b] [i](coder/admin, coder/mod, gfx, website...)[/i] [b]Skills:[/b] [i](with this position)[/i] [b]Why join?[/b] [i](reason)[/i]
[code][b]Position:[/b] [i](coder/admin, coder/mod, gfx, website...)[/i] [b]Skills:[/b] [i](with this position)[/i] [b]Why join?[/b] [i](reason)[/i][/code]
Thats all, Xeno.
